full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Most urgent thing on the website is to refer to the pop-up sale.

Can you use what Penny has emailed?

Can this be inserted or linked using the View Range button please.

Also, take away sub-copy on home page referring to Northern Beaches.

Kind regards,
Roger Camplisson

Osier Belle Pty Ltd
www.osierbelle.com.au <http://www.osierbelle.com.au/>
(02) 9949 9466

<http://www.osierbelle.com.au/>
Osier Belle
Outdoor Furniture Northern Beaches Store
Osier Belle is an Outdoor Furniture store on the Northern Beaches providing you with quality outdoor furniture you can trust. A company with a difference!
Read more... <http://www.osierbelle.com.au/>


---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Penny Camplisson <info@osierbelle.com.au <mailto:info@osierbelle.com.au>>
Date: Tue, Apr 30, 2019 at 11:17 AM
Subject: Fwd: [Test] Osier Belle Luxury Outdoor Furniture - POP UP SALE - Starts Wednesday 1st May
To: Osier Belle <sales@osierbelle.com.au <mailto:sales@osierbelle.com.au>>, Ella <contact@osierbelle.com.au <mailto:contact@osierbelle.com.au>>






Osier Belle Luxury Outdoor Furniture

EX DISPLAY & SAMPLE SALE

Starts Wednesday 1st May 2019

17 Grosvenor Lane, Neutral Bay
(next to Carolina's and Health Food Shop)

20% - 80% OFF RETAIL PRICE

AMAZING DISCOUNTS, HUGE DEALS

Each year we ship SAMPLE & MOCK UP IDEAS
from our factory so these can offered to our customers at amazing prices.

We also have a number of EX DISPLAY, EX RENTAL and STOCK items available to purchase at a heavily discounted price.

As a valued customer, here is a preview of some special offers that will start
10.00am - Wednesday 1st May @ 11 Grosvenor Lane, NEUTRAL BAY.
(Flagship showroom nearby will also be open from
Thursday 2nd May with some discounts available)

Sofas, Lounges, Coffee Tables - up to 80% off
Popular Tresse Collection - up to 60% off
All weather cushions - up to 50% off
Extension Tables - 30% off
Dining Tables - up to 60% off
Chairs and Benches - up to 80% off
Bar Table and Bar Stools - up to 40% off
Lampshades and Lanterns - up to 60% off
Sunloungers - 60% off
Ex Rental - up to 80% off

Pop Up Sale: 17 Grosvenor Lane, Neutral Bay
Open Daily from 10am to 5pm

Flagship Store: 24 Young Street, Neutral Bay
Open Daily from 10am to 5pm (closed Wednesdays)

www.osierbelle.com.au <http://www.osierbelle.com.au/>
